Upcoming Developments

Exciting new features and improvements coming to SQLInsights. Stay tuned for these amazing updates!

AI-Powered Query Optimization
In Development
Automatically optimize your SQL queries for better performance using machine learning algorithms.
Expected Timeline:Q2 2024
Real-time Collaboration
Planning
Share dashboards and collaborate with team members in real-time with live updates.
Expected Timeline:Q3 2024
Advanced Chart Types
Coming Soon
Support for more visualization types including heatmaps, scatter plots, and geographic maps.
Expected Timeline:Q2 2024
API Integration
Planning
RESTful API for integrating SQLInsights into your existing applications and workflows.
Expected Timeline:Q4 2024
